data.title: NT LIVE: Present Laughter
data.text:
Screening Times

To book online, please select a time from below:

Thursday 29th August

Wednesday 4th September

Alternatively you can book in person at the Box Office or call on: 020 8912 5162

Info

Watch Trailer

As he prepares to embark on an overseas tour, star actor Garry Essendine’s colourful life is in danger of spiralling out of control. Engulfed by an escalating identity crisis as his many and various relationships compete for his attention, Garry’s few remaining days at home are a chaotic whirlwind of love, sex, panic and soul-searching.

Starring: Indira Varma, Andrew Scott, Kitty Archer, Enzo Cilenti, Joshua Hill, Abdul Salis, Liza Sadovy, Luke Thallon, Sophie Thompson, Suzie Toase

Director: Matthew Warchus

Writer: Noël Coward

Running Time: 167 minutes

Certificate: PG

Language: English

Genre: Drama

Country: United Kingdom

★★★★★ Times
